name: 陳起鳳
objective:
本課程除介紹土木工程的基本領域，如結構工程、大地工程、營建管理、生態與防災、水資源與水利工程、空間資訊、環境工程等外，亦強調環境生態、環境與人文等社會層面的議題，更著重於土木工程與環境的關係，期使未來在土木建設之際，亦能瞭解環境、尊重生態及朝永續利用的目標努力。另本課程亦強調訓練學生團隊合作、設計構想與動手實作能力，藉由課堂所學基本土木工程知識，利用簡易材料與設備再以電腦軟體輔助，自行構思、設計與製作土木結構或設備模型，及利用既有設備測試所設計之成品。
In this course, not only professional fields of civil engineering including structural engineering, geotechnical engineering, construction management, ecological engineering and disaster prevention, water resources and hydraulic engineering, and spatial information are introduced, but also environmental, ecological, societal, and cultural issues are emphasized. The most important point is focused on the relationship between civil engineering and environment such that students who take this course can understand environment, appreciate ecology, and pursue sustainable development when they are engaged in civil engineering construction in future. In addition, training of team works and ability to think, design, and carry out a plan by hand are emphasized. Students can plan, design, fabricate, and test a structural model using available material, equipment, and computer-aid software based on knowledge learned from fundamental civil engineering courses.
schedule:
Week 1: 課程說明與土木環工總論
Week 2　交通運輸與環境
Week 3　土地開發與環境
Week 4　水資源開發與環境
Week 5　海洋工程與環境
Week 6 大地工程與環境
Week 7　人造環境與設計
Week 8　營建工程之環境問題
Week 9 期中考
Week 10　環境工程
Week 11　環境問題的人文與社會層面
Week 12　環境品質與法規
Week 13　環境影響評估
Week 14　都市發展與環境
Week 15-18　實作成果展示
